DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; NORWAY ; HIJACKING BY BOSNIAN ENDS PEACEFULLY
DOC.TEXT: A Bosnian hijacker surrendered after commandeering an airliner with 129 people aboard over northern Norway and demanding that aid supply_lines be opened_to Muslim areas in Bosnia-Herzegovina. " It is the third winter . It is very cold , " the 25-year-old refugee said in a tape_recording released to Norwegian media . He threatened to kill the passengers if police stormed the plane , parked on a darkened tarmac at Gardermoen Airport just north of Oslo . After negotiating with police , he surrendered without violence .
